content.question: Larry wants to be more open to new experiences. According to a behaviorist, how could he teach himself to be more open?

choices.label: Give himself a reward every time he convinces himself to participate in a new experience.
Mentally walk himself through what each potential new experience will be like to convince himself that it will be a positive experience.
Force himself to engage in one new experience a day until it is second nature.
Explore what happened in his childhood that makes him reluctant to try new things.

content.answer: Give himself a reward every time he convinces himself to participate in a new experience.
